select bank_product.id, plat_id, name, product_num, period_num, profit_type, limit_day, start_date, end_date, deadline, disbank, start_money, add_money, limit_money, area, channel, is_transfer, customer, state, risk_rank, issue_size, expect_profit_year, pub_time, notice, trade, customer_info, manual, is_delete, oprate_mode, limit_type, regis_code, pro_start_date, pro_end_date, days, max_profit, min_profit, act_profit, asset_type, init_worth, pro_worth, currency, bus_start_date, bus_end_date, bank_product.create_time, bank_product.update_time from bank_product, user_attention_product where bank_product.id = user_attention_product.pId and user_attention_product.uId = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_attention_product.type = 1
limit #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
